name: 2021 ROBOT BOXING CHAMPIONSHIP
description:
This is a 2 person PvP battle game played in the same computer. It supports 1 Xbox controller and a pc if you dont have a xbox controller Don't worry You still play it ON THE SAME PC. The characters have some " SPECIAL ACTIONS"                                             :)

SO WELL HERE ARE THE CONTROLLS:

PLAYER 1 PC (LEFT SIDE);    W,A,S,D  for left, right, back, front.  Keyboard 1,2,3,4 and ctrl for the "SPECIAL ACTIONS" And most important PUNCH Keyboard key TAB, space bar for jump, Mouse move for view angle.

PLAYER 2 PC/X BOX CONTROLLER (RIGHT SIDE);  FOR PC - NumberPad 8,4,5,6 for left, right, back, front. NumberPad Enter for jump AND NumberPad "0, the dot , 1 , 3 AND FINALLY  Mouse scroll wheel up or down for view angle.

PLAYER 2 FOR X BOX - D Pad UP, DOWN, LEFT, RIGHT,  for left, right, back, front. Left joystick for view angle. Right joystick for player left and right.  Y for running X, B, A Are special actions. RB for punch. RT for jump.

This applyes for both players : NumberPad - and + forcamara zoom amount.
